trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_00<tab>Amh Garanjy could use some help from an adventurer.※ This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_01<tab>Strolling through the Starlight Celebration festivities in Gridania, you encounter Amh Garanjy, enthusiastic Starlight celebrant. The market at the Starlight Stalls is a roaring success─so much so, that the celebrants are too busy to attend to their planned provision of mulled punch. In need of a capable pair of hands, Amh Garanjy entreats your aid in ensuring the warm and festive beverages are available for the festivalgoers. Thankful for your willing assent, she bids you join her at the Starlight Stalls, which you may travel to by speaking with the Starlight Stalls guide at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre. ※ Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_02<tab>You have arrived at the Starlight Stalls, located on Gridania's outskirts, where you catch sight of Amh Garanjy. You make your way over to her to hear further details on the planned punch.※ In the event that you leave the Starlight Stalls, you may return by speaking with the Starlight Stalls guide at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_03<tab>Speaking with Amh Garanjy and Mother Miounne, you learn of the plan to create three separate types of kinderpunsch to represent Gridania, Limsa Lominsa, and Ul'dah─each to be served in an appropriately decorated festive mug. Miounne is still unsure of the best blends to encapsulate the other cities, but there are doubtless some experts on regional cuisine among the visitors to the Gridanian markets. Working your way around the stalls, you keep an eye out for anyone who may be able to furnish you with advice and inspiration for the mulled punch recipes.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_04<tab>You have acquired some useful pointers from several visitors to Gridania, which you are eager to share with Amh Garanjy in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_05<tab>Brimming with inspiration, Amh Garanjy sets about making arrangements to procure the required ingredients. In the meantime, she bids you speak to the children visiting the Starlight Stalls and inform them of the upcoming kinderpunsch on offer. She suggests you take note of any preferences they express, to better recommend a refreshment to their tastes.The Starlight Stalls guide in Mih Khetto’s Amphitheatre will show you to the stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_06<tab>With the children suitably informed and enthused, you make your way over to speak to the saturnine Starlight celebrant and assist in serving the kinderpunsch.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_07<tab>All the children have been furnished with beverages and are pleased as punch. At the encouragement of the saturnine Starlight celebrant, who steps in to relieve you of your duties, you return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre to inform Amh Garanjy of the success at the stalls.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SEQ_08<tab>While all the children enjoyed their drinks, it seems that Joultain─a young boy with a strong wanderlust─is particularly replete with festive cheer, thanks to the help of a certain adventurer.If, inspired by the spirit of Starlight, you wish to assist with the punch stall once more, you may speak to the saturnine Starlight celebrant at the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Starlight Stalls guide.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Amh Garanjy at the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_02<tab>Speak with visitors to Gridania near the markets.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Amh Garanjy.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_04<tab>Speak with children visiting the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the saturnine Starlight celebrant.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Amh Garanjy at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_XMXMARKETWARP_000_001<tab>Apologies, the stalls are somewhat overcrowded at present. I'd be happy to escort you through shortly, once the situation is in hand.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_002<tab>Happy Starlight, good adventurer! I am Amh Garanjy, Starlight celebrant.Might this be your first time partaking in the festivities?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_003<tab>Merry Starlight, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What a pleasure it is to see you again in this most festive of seasons. Allow me to reiterate my thanks for your contributions to Starlights past!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_004<tab>The Starlight Celebration is a festival that finds its origins in an old Ishgardian tale, and is all about granting the wishes of children. And I'm delighted to say that this year's Celebration offers joy and merriment to all, regardless of age, as we once again host our festive market: the Starlight Stalls!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_005<tab>The Starlight celebrants are pleased to be working with the fine folk at the Carline Canopy to provide kinderpunsch, a kind of mulled punch, to our guests. It was a great success last Starlight—for what could be better than perusing the stalls, warm drink in hand?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_006<tab>Though we had hoped to try something new for the stalls this Starlight. Alas, while it is a blessing to have so many merrymakers enjoying the market, it means all the celebrants are busy attending to our guests, leaving none available to attend to our plans for the punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_100_006<tab>And so, I must ask whether I could prevail upon your assistance, my dear adventurer.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_007<tab>Oh, thank you for your kindness!If I could ask you to join me in the Starlight Stalls, I shall explain the particulars.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_008<tab>Pray speak to the Starlight Stalls guide, who will gladly escort you.I will see you anon, by the Carline Canopy stall!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_XMXMARKETWARP_000_010<tab>Oh, you must be the adventurer who so kindly agreed to help us!Allow me to show you to the Starlight Stalls.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Head to the Starlight Stalls?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MARKETSHOP05231_000_021<tab>We're getting our new lineup ready. Come back soon!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_020<tab>Once again, thank you for your assistance.I sent word to Mother Miounne of the Carline Canopy, and she will be joining us forthwith. Once she arrives, we'll provide all the information you should require.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_030<tab>Well now, who have we here? You certainly have an eye for talent, Amh. I take it you're the adventurer she's roped in to help?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_031<tab>And after you did such fine work for the last festival, too.Thanks to you, our kinderpunsch is the talk—and drink—of the town in Starlight season!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_032<tab>As Amh Garanjy may have mentioned, the Carline Canopy serves kinderpunsch─a warm, sweet drink made by simmering spices in fruit juice. Last Starlight Celebration, we handed it out in mugs with a Gridanian design.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_033<tab>The other day, I happened to mention the initiative to my fellow guildmasters. They near jumped at the chance to have Limsa Lominsa and Ul'dah represented, as you can see from our new-and-improved lineup!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_034<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_100_034<tab>The mugs are decorated with local vistas and motifs─a grand ship on the Lominsan mug, and a cactuar on the Ul'dahn mug, for example. And of course, some Starlight decorations have been worked into the designs for a festive touch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_035<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_100_035<tab>Since we have such wonderful new mugs, it seems only right to use them to hand out three different types of kinderpunsch!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_036<tab>For the Gridanian punch, we've juiced apples harvested here in the Black Shroud and gently simmered it with complementary flavors including blood currants, herbs and cinnamon.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_037<tab>Personally, I'm of the mind that we may as well go the full malm with the Lominsan and Ul'dahn punch and create a signature drink from the produce and tastes of the cities. I've just been mulling over what ingredients to use…
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_038<tab>And therein lies our request!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_039<tab>Hello! Could we get some mulled punch, please?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_040<tab>Hold on, are those new mug designs!? Woah!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_041<tab>Are these other cities!? What are they like? I wanna hear all about them!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_042<tab>Patience, my dear Joultain!We're presently preparing some kinderpunsch that recreates local flavors from these very cities, so if you can but give us a little time, I promise that we'll provide a tour for your tastebuds!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_043<tab>Haha, it seems as though the little ones are looking forward to our enterprise as well. And what a healthy appetite for learning about new lands!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_044<tab>Well then, it falls to us to create Lominsan and Ul'dahn punch that lives up to those high expectations!And I have just the task for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_100_044<tab>Would you be so kind as to gather information on what ingredients we should use to best capture each city?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_110_044<tab>I daresay many visitors from across the realm stop by the shopping district when in Gridania. A seasoned adventurer such as yourself is sure to be able to identify those who hail from Limsa Lominsa and Ul’dah—and to coax out the relevant information!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_046<tab>Marvelous! I will report at once to the other celebrants and keep them apprised of the situation, before returning to my post in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre. I shall be most keen to hear your findings!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_060<tab>Wow, a real-life adventurer…! Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>. I can't wait to try the kinderpunsch!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_061<tab>Once again, my thanks for your kind assistance. I look forward to hearing what ingredients the visitors from Limsa Lominsa and Ul’dah suggest!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_LOMINSANCHEF05231_000_070<tab>Mulled punch with the flavors of Limsa, you say?You'll be wanting to throw in plenty of La Noscean oranges, lowland grapes, and lemons.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_LOMINSANCHEF05231_000_071<tab>Lominsan citrus is renowned far beyond the shores of Vylbrand and keeps scurvy─that bane of sailors─at bay. I ensure we always keep well stocked.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_LOMINSANCHEF05231_000_072<tab>Oh, did I neglect to mention? Head of procurement at the Bismarck, fine dining establishment in Limsa Lominsa, at your service. If you're looking for quality ingredients at a good price, happy to point you in the right direction!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_LOMINSANCHEF05231_100_072<tab>If you want to make mulled punch with a Lominsan twist, you can't go wrong with La Noscean citrus!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNLADY05231_000_073<tab>What’s that, you say? Ingredients prized in Ul’dahn cuisine? I could give you a standard answer—nopal, spices—but, oh, what a waste! Our culinary journeys should be an adventure!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNLADY05231_000_074<tab>Ohoho! The harmonies of unexpected fusion and avant-garde ingredients… Why, it's a culinary Coliseum, with all the drama of a fierce bout!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNLADY05231_000_075<tab>Ahh, simply sublime. It may be a little…stimulating for mere children, but us adults can appreciate a little experimentation─wouldn't you agree?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNMERCHANT05231_000_076<tab>You want to make a drink to represent Ul'dah?Tea should be a good place to start. Us Ul'danhns can't get through the day without a good, strong brew!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNMERCHANT05231_000_077<tab>You'll always find it served up in the drinkeries of Ul'dah, whether you're there for a slap-up meal or just a sweet treat. I've heard tell that the sultana takes hers with the finest butter and honey, you know.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNMERCHANT05231_000_078<tab>Aside from tea, you have Thanalan specialties like vanilla, cloves, black pepper, and pearl ginger. The finest produce will part you from your gil like precious gems.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_ULDAHNMERCHANT05231_100_078<tab>If you're making a drink that represents Ul'dah, it needs to have some tea in it. Butter and spice would make good accents too!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_079<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.What did you discover?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_080<tab>But of course! What better to create a signature drink than local produce? I have taken the liberty of noting down the key ingredients, and I believe my fellow celebrants and I should be able to arrange procurement—pray leave it with us.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_081<tab>Once the kinderpunsch is ready, I wonder if you would do the honors and serve the punch to the children? With your intimate knowledge of each city, I suspect it will elevate the experience. You need only speak to my colleague in the Starlight Stalls.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_082<tab>Oh, thank you! In the meantime, could I ask you to speak to the little ones and let them know that the punch will soon be ready? They were so looking forward to it!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_083<tab>And they seemed ever so keen to learn about cultures beyond Gridania. Perhaps you could listen to where their interests lie, and decide which kind of punch will bring them the most Starlight cheer?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_084<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_090<tab>When you let the little ones know that the kinderpunsch is ready, perhaps you could ask them if there’s a specific city that captures their interest. Once you’ve spoken to them all, pray speak to my colleague in the Starlight Stalls!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_091<tab>Don't worry, things are quite in hand here.An enthusiastic young man even offered to help, would you believe!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_100<tab>The mulled punch is nearly ready?I'm really looking forward to it!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_101<tab>What do I like? Hmm…fruit! I like apples and berries, but it might be fun to try some fruit that doesn't grow in the Black Shroud.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_102<tab>They're giving out hot drinks…?That sounds great!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_103<tab>Um… I'm visiting with my mum. It's my first time here, so, I want to learn more about Gridania…!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_104<tab>Oh, you're the adventurer from before! The mulled punch is almost ready? I'm so there!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_105<tab>I want to learn more about all the different cities, so I can't decide which type of punch to get… There's no ocean here in Gridania, so one day, I want to get on a big ship and sail off to faraway lands for myself!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_110<tab>I'll head over soon! I can't wait to try some exotic fruit!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_111<tab>It's my first time in Gridania. Um… I'm looking forward to seeing more of the city!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_112<tab>I want to learn more about other lands. One day I'll sail on a big ship and go on an epic journey!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_120<tab>Oh, what good timing. We received the last of the ingredients a moment ago, and have just put the new batches of kinderpunsch on the heat.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_121<tab>No doubt we'll have a horde of children descend upon us as soon as we open. By all means, feel free to put the finishing touches to the punch and serve it up yourself—just let me know when you're ready.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q2_000_000<tab>Are you ready to serve the punch?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A2_000_001<tab>Never been readier.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A2_000_002<tab>Review the characteristics of each city and the punch it inspired.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A2_000_003<tab>No, not yet.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_123<tab>Distributing festive cheer will take several minutes. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_124<tab>Start serving the punch?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_125<tab>Gridania is in the Black Shroud, a deep forest that the elementals call home. The Carline Canopy kinderpunsch uses apple and cinnamon. You can almost taste the bounty of the forest!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_126<tab>Limsa Lominsa is a port city thronging with ships bringing cuisine and culture from far-flung lands.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_127<tab>The Lominsan kinderpunsch is made with citrus fruits from La Noscea, including lemons and oranges, in a fusion of flavor that calls to mind the mingling of different peoples in the city itself.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_128<tab>Ul'dah is a sultanate, ruled by Sultana Nanamo Ul Namo. All kinds of exotic goods carried by merchant caravans from faraway lands line the stalls of the bazaar, while the nobility flock to luxurious seating in the Coliseum that gives them a fine view of the clashes between gladiators below.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_129<tab>The Ul'dahn kinderpunsch is a sweet butter tea simmered with dried fruit and black pepper. It combines flavors fit for royalty with just a little hit of spice.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231C_000_130<tab>Um, I have a friend who used to live in Ul'dah. I want to know what his life was like back there. Do you have any mulled punch that could give me a taste of Ul'dah?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A3_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A3_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A3_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231C_000_132<tab>Woah, this tea has a lot of spices, but it's still sweet. This must be what Ul'dah smells like! I'm going to bring my friend over, too!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231C_000_133<tab>This is so good! But what makes it Ul'dah…? I'll go find my friend, and I can ask him about it while we drink punch together!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_134<tab>Hello! Do you have a punch with lots of fruit? I'd like to try some fruit I don't usually get to eat round here!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A4_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A4_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A4_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_136<tab>Oh! It's sour, but sweet! This is so good… I didn't realise that La Noscea had so many kinds of fruit that don't grow here in the Black Shroud!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231A_000_137<tab>Yum, this punch is great! Come to think of it, I saw the next stall over sells orange juice. Maybe I'll come back and get some in a bit!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231D_100_137<tab>You here for punch too? Come on, let's go up together!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_110_137<tab>Th-Thank you!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231D_000_138<tab>I heard there's a coliseum somewhere where loads of gladiators fight each other. Bring me some punch that'll make me feel like a mighty fighter of the bloodsands!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A5_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A5_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A5_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231D_000_140<tab>The Coliseum is in some place called Ul'dah? Can't say I've heard of it, but the tingling spices are battling it out on my tongue like ferocious gladiators! I'm fired up, in more ways than one!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231D_000_141<tab>Oh yeah, these spices are getting me fired up! Time for my gladiator training regime!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_142<tab>Oh, you're the nice <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var> from before…!Um… It's my first time here. What do you recommend?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A6_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A6_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A6_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_144<tab>Thank you! Wow, you can really taste the apples…and this mug is so cute! I guess there must be a lot of moogles living in the Black Shroud? Oh, I hope I meet some before I go home…!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_CHILD05231B_000_145<tab>Thank you! It's so warm, and it tastes great. I'm going to enjoy my trip and explore the rest of the Starlight Stalls!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_146<tab>Hmm…which should I choose? I want to know more about everywhere…! Let's see… Do you have any punch that will make me feel like I'm on a journey to a faraway land?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_Q7_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A7_000_001<tab>Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A7_000_002<tab>Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_A7_000_003<tab>Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_148<tab>Wow, there are so many different flavors! I love it! And this mug is so cool. It's ships like this that connect the whole world…!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_149<tab>Wow, there are so many different flavors! I love it!Come to think of it, traders sell all kinds of goods from other nations in the markets, right? Next time I visit, I'll take a good look!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_150<tab>Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! This was a lot of fun!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_151<tab>Looks like the children really enjoyed your choice of punch. A job well done, I suppose.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_152<tab>How lovely to see them enjoying the punch…mostly. Well, it looks like all the children who wanted some have had their fill for now.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_153<tab>I'm sure I can manage from here—how about you head back to Amh Garanjy and let her know how the inaugural punch provisioning went? Don't worry, I'll make sure everyone has as much punch as they could possibly want, whether guest or celebrant.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_COMMITTEE05231_000_160<tab>Knowing Amh Garanjy, I'm sure she's fretting about how it's all going.You can leave the stall to me and let her know!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_170<tab>Oh, here you are. I've just finished putting out a few fires at the Adventurers' Guild, so I thought I'd stop by and see how you were getting on.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_171<tab>The more the merrier! And if you're here, my friend, I can only assume that the kinderpunsch has been handed out to the little ones as planned?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_172<tab>Wonderful! Once again, you have my thanks. I do hope that the Starlight Stalls have given the dear children a glimpse into a wider world they may one day get to explore for themselves!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_173<tab>And if they come back to try all three types of punch, they'll spend even longer in the stalls and leave having enjoyed themselves all the more─which is what we want.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_174<tab>Good, I found you! I wanted to say thank you again─to Miss Garanjy and Mother Miounne, too!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_175<tab>Oh, you are most welcome! I take it you enjoyed the mulled punch?

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_176<tab>When I grow up, I want to be someone who knows all about faraway lands─just like you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! I'll go and see what’s out there for myself, and tell everyone all about it.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_JOULTAIN_000_177<tab>And I want to tell everyone about Gridania, too. The Starlight Stalls have reminded me just how much I love it here!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_178<tab>Oh, what a lovely Starlight wish! I've no doubt the Spinner herself will have heard your words, little one.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_179<tab>I can already tell that I'll be seeing you stride into my Carline Canopy to register with the guild one day, young man. And I'll look forward to hearing your tales of courage and high adventure.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_MIOUNNE_000_180<tab>Of course, that goes for you as well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I always have time for your stories.

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_181<tab>The bright smile on young Joultain's face was all thanks to you, my friend. It seems you've truly inspired him!The kinderpunsch stall will continue to serve its festive cheer to one and all. Should you be able to spare the time away from your adventures, we would gladly welcome your aid again!

TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_AMHGARANJY_000_182<tab>The Starlight Stalls guide will be happy to show you to the stalls whenever you so wish, until the festivities come to a close.I do hope you'll find the time to peruse the market yourself. Once again, a very Merry Starlight to you, my friend!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_185<tab>The vendors at the Starlight Stalls are now open for business!
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_186<tab>You can speak to the saturnine Starlight celebrant at the Starlight Stalls if you want to lend a hand by serving more kinderpunsch.
TEXT_FESXMX101_05231_SYSTEM_000_187<tab>Who knows what familiar faces you might encounter…?
